code:
gantt
    title Planificación Round Robin (Security_Firewall) - Parte 1 (Security_IntrusionDetection)
    dateFormat X
    axisFormat %s

    section CPU
    P1(Security_IntrusionDetection)      :active, cpu1, 0, 3
    P2(Security_ZeroTrust)      :active, cpu2, 3, 6
    P3(Security_OAuth2)      :active, cpu3, 6, 9
    P4(Security_ZeroTrust)     :active, cpu4, 9, 11
    P1(Security_Firewall)    :active, cpu5, 11, 13
    P3(Security_Encryption)    :active, cpu6, 13, 14
    P2(Security_OAuth2)    :active, cpu7, 14, 15

    section I/O
    P1_IO(Security_IntrusionDetection) :crit, io1, 13, 15
    P2_IO(Security_Encryption) :crit, io2, 15, 16
    P4_IO(Security_ZeroTrust) :crit, io3, 11, 14
repo_description: Introducción a los sistemas operativos, partiendo de sistemas Unix. Exportación a PDF y ePUB.
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
